website_summaries.verdict: Terrific water barbells that deliver exceptional quality and are sold at a budget-friendly price.
pros: Padded grips make the barbells perfect for extended workouts
Constructed from lightweight, durable and chlorine-resistant EVA foam
cons: Not intended for lightweight resistance workouts
May fill up with water at times

customer_reviews.title: Perfect heavier weight.  NOT the lightweight resistance
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily and love them!!! They are a much better resistance for folks that have been doing water aerobics or have good arm strength already. I purchased these over a year ago and use them daily and they are still in fantastic condition!
customer_reviews.author: tablet AT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for aqua workouts and swimming at ANY age
customer_reviews.text: A friend turned me onto these in Arizona...where I have easy access to pools. I use them frequently and they REALLY make a difference.....my arms get a good workout and it also helps tone my core. I'm a "senior citizen"....and I can choose the level of workout I want and also target where my body needs toning up. I also use them when swimming laps to get extra resistance in my strokes. There are endless uses of these barbells.....it is up to the individual to use them as desired....great to have such freedom for a workout...and they really DO work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie "history buff"

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for water aerobics. I've had mine for almost a year and I use them three to four times a week. They're still sturdy. If you get a pair of these, don't forget to rinse them after use and to dry them well so that they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Super K

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart when submerged
customer_reviews.text: One of the barbells fell apart after the second use. Unfortunately for me, the date of return through Amazon has expired and I’m unable to do a return. I called Speedo when I saw that they gave a 90 day guarantee. Speedo DOESE NOT guarantee their product and will not replace the defective barbell since it was purchased through Amazon. The red cap at the end pops out and the barbell falls apart each time it is submerged. If you need this product I would go with another brand or order it directly through the speedo website.
customer_reviews.author: YVM37

customer_reviews.title: Great product, poor workmanship on this set
customer_reviews.text: I love these Speedo Aqua Fitness Barbells, BUT, after my first use one of cap ends popped off! It was the result of poor workmanship and poor quality control inspection. The PVC tube was ruff cut with bits of white plastic still attached, the cut was uneven so the two plastic pin catches on the end cap that are suppose to snap into the PVC tube holes don't match up. Great design, poor workmanship. Hopefully I just got a Monday morning built unit!
customer_reviews.author: KJP-EAG

customer_reviews.title: great in the swimming pool
customer_reviews.text: They make exercise in the pool fun and easy. light weight, not heavy to drag to the pool, dry quickly, and using them makes a difference. Push em under the water, letting them come up slowly, then down again, etc. Use your ingenuity. My upper arms look better.
customer_reviews.author: asym44

customer_reviews.title: The ends popped off.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these five years ago and have had great success with them. A few months ago the ends started popping off, and after five years I was not surprised (I use them four time a week). So I reordered, and the ends popped off after a few days. Speedo was quick to exchange them, however the replacement order had the ends popping off the very first day. Too bad, it WAS a good product.
customer_reviews.author: justkristik

customer_reviews.title: Damaged OEM box, but still shipped to us, unknown if the damaged dumbbell will last or not.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 3 of these, and 1 was delivered with a damaged Speedo box and damage to the outer foam of the dumbbell . The Amazon box was fine, so whatever entity that places into the shipping container didn't notice or care there was damage.
customer_reviews.author: Icm

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I do water aerobics 3x a week. These particular barbells are clearly better quality than others in the class use, and they all asked me where I got them :-). The best, period.
customer_reviews.author: Derf Keebslak

customer_reviews.title: Heavier and narrower than earlier version
customer_reviews.text: There is barely room for my hands between the weights and it takes more resistance than the one I was replacing it with... so it keeps me higher out of the water when I use them as water wings and pinches my under arm. I am sure making same product just a little smaller saved some money.... but it didn't help the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Shealy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of resistance! Great workout tool in the pool!
customer_reviews.text: Whoa! Talk about a great workout! These weights provide more resistance than I expected. Be careful not to overdo with the first use! My son loves using them...he said he feels like a body builder! LOL I am not overly sore, but can tell I am getting a great workout when I use these. If you are just starting out, you might want to use some smaller ones. Lots of resistance!
customer_reviews.author: Colin K Canady

customer_reviews.title: These provide a great workout
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to strengthen my core muscles in the pool for physical therapy. They are perfect. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A. Mallonee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These aquatic dumbbells are the perfect size for a pool workout. They are high quality foam and superior workmanship. I've been swimming for 50yrs (some competitively as a younger man) and the Speedo name is synonymous with quality watersports equipment and swimwear. If you are looking for the perfect pool workout, this is your equipment.
customer_reviews.author: bruce campbell

customer_reviews.title: Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: Have used these 5 days a week for the last 3 weeks and they work well. The weight when in the water is perfect for getting a great workout. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Lucci0517

customer_reviews.title: Pool bellbar
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made bellbar for the pool. I had tried another, no name, but had to return it since it fell apart after only 2 uses. This has better foam construction and holds up very well. Glad I was able to get it.
customer_reviews.author: EJS

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Bought my own set since everyone in class has been upping their game with the pool's medium bells. Made sure they were instantly recognized as not part of the pool stock which is black. They work just as well and will hopefully last a long time. At this point they are pretty water-repellent, but perhaps as they age they will lose this ability to shed water.
customer_reviews.author: MairC

customer_reviews.title: Great Muscle Toner
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! I use them twice a week for aquatic exercise. This is the most popular design among all the ladies. They offer just enough resistance in the water to tone the muscles. I'll be 68 next month, and they are keeping my arms in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Bruns

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work
customer_reviews.text: Just started using and they definitely provide a good arm workout for the 60+ person.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great barbells
customer_reviews.text: Love these barbells I’ve been doing water aerobics for over 19 years These barbells are very comfortable to hold and perfect for my workouts Great color combination I do have to say they are heavier weight resistant in the water than some barbells Very lightweight to carry (weight almost nothing) Great price Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Y

customer_reviews.title: Exercise without the sweat!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for poolside exercise!! Use as directed or as you feel will best suit you! I've used similar ones in an organized class. But after just sitting around a friends pool I decided to purchase these to use in our community pool. I've used them all summer and they look the same as the day they arrived. They're excellent for some added core exercise with a better range than you can achieve on land.
customer_reviews.author: Courtchic

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: These are med, there work very will, once they get wet. very will made. very happy with the workout. Update, after useing many time I am very happy. The more I use them more they have heavness and give harder workout
customer_reviews.author: Donald S Webster

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the aqua fitness barbells because i do water aerobics. People! these are the best. I can't swim but I feel safe in the water. They hold me up in the water. I can float backwards. What I like the most is use them for strengthen my back, arms, and legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great barbells for water exercising
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality barbells that are perfect for water aerobics or aquacize. They are lightweight so they are easy to carry to and from the pool but once in water they are heavy enough to sustain adequate resistance. I’m impressed with them and have used them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: gemgirl

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart on first use.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look and the product would have been great if not for the fact that it literally broke apart on first use. The red end caps that hold the dumbbell together came off and the whole thing falls apart. Too bad because I really wanted these.
customer_reviews.author: AvaJ

customer_reviews.title: Great upper arm workout
customer_reviews.text: I do water aerobics 3-4 x a week and these bar bells enhance my upper body training. Very light but creates a lot of resistance in the water
customer_reviews.author: Cauvet

customer_reviews.title: Great training barbells.  Quality materials and construction.
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction. Great material. I love the great upper body workout it get while hanging out in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Commodore

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had this set of barbells for 5 years and they are still holding up great. I love using them to exercise in the pool. I am now buying another set since everyone wants to use them when I get in the pool. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JenK

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with stronger wrists
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these barbells for his daily water walking workout. He has really seen an increase in arm strength since using them. However, I had to give mine to a friend because I broke my wrist several years ago and the extra exertion on my wrist was uncomfortable. My friend loves them though!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna C. Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Great workout!
customer_reviews.text: I love these for water aerobics. I get a great workout; I can tell the difference in my muscle tone from the three weeks I have used them. They are much better than I anticipated. There is a little water seepage from the handles but it does drain from the end pins when I set them on end.
customer_reviews.author: GJD

customer_reviews.title: I was totally disappointed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to be able to use them at Aqua fit class. I started the class few days ago. I was totally disappointed with the quality . I noticed it is heavier after one time use but I didnt take it serious and after few minutes realized that there was some water in it. It leaked right at the first use!!! Forget about scratches on the barbells that I saw right after openning the box( might be due to miss handling during the shipping) .
customer_reviews.author: JennyG

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the identical pair a few years ago and they are still holding up very well. Repurchased this year because the red band turned pink after three years in the sun. Needed a new set because my wife likes the the color and doesn't share.
customer_reviews.author: GF5 - JGF

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described Opened this afternoon & used in our above ground pool early evening Only regret, not ordering a 2nd set My man/husband was hoggin in on.... Dried quickly after fresh water rinse
customer_reviews.author: PattMomm

customer_reviews.title: Work well for water exercises
customer_reviews.text: These are great for use in the pool for water exercises and have made quite a difference in my workout routines.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Betz

customer_reviews.title: Love them. When these wear out I'll buy another ...
customer_reviews.text: Sent for these to work on upper body strength as I'm in the pool every day here in the FL Keys. I use them as I'd use gym weights and my arms, shoulders and back are the strongest they've ever been. I even figured out how to position them to work on quads for a lower body workout. Love them. When these wear out I'll buy another set. The only negative is as others mentioned, they hold water some and make puddles on the floor of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene S.

customer_reviews.title: Swim weights
customer_reviews.text: I used these one time in a swimming pool , the end cap came off and I was unable to find it or if found , would continue to pop off , rendering this useless , I just ordered another pair that was cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome workout!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. After taking a water class at my gym I wanted to find some for my pool at home. I checked local sports stores and their quality was poor. These ones are awesome. Dumbbells can't slip off. They're comfy. Great resistance. Very comparable to the gym ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: they are great. Giving enough resistance when under water and help ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a bunch of these for friends so we can do water aerobics together, they are great. Giving enough resistance when under water and help float for ab exercises. Just remember to "burb" them. Water will get in the handle, when your done just pull back one of the ends enough to unplug a hole and let the water run out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tefft

customer_reviews.title: Great underwater resistance
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are great!!! They provide a great deal of resistance for water aerobics. When I told friends this, and they picked them up out of the water, they thought I was a wuss. However, when they tried them under the water for curls, they became believers.
customer_reviews.author: KateTall

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic workout
customer_reviews.text: I belong to a physical therapy pool group which meets weekly. We use dumbbells for most of the exercises we do. Although we have dumbbells to use, the ones with most resistance are most popular and not always available and the others are offer me no resistance at all and I end up using two on each hand. I purchased these for myself and a friend. The resistance in water is fantastic. They give me a major workout. I use them daily in my own pool for my upper body workout. I recommend these for anyone who wants a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: CapeMarj

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I owned them before once I moved and was traveling across the country make sure I purchased a new set they are perfect....
customer_reviews.author: philip varner

customer_reviews.title: Great weights for the pool!
customer_reviews.text: Love these in the pool. I use them for arm exercises and also as floatees under my arms in the deep end to exercise my legs. Well made product! They came highly recommended by a friend. I purchased them on Amazon because they had the best price and quick shipment.
customer_reviews.author: BonBonB

customer_reviews.title: My favorite water weights!
customer_reviews.text: I am a swimmer and I love these speedo water weights I have been using these weights for years and they are very good
customer_reviews.author: Cephianne

customer_reviews.title: They keep falling apart
customer_reviews.text: The end piece keeps falling out and won't stay in so using these to work out is almost impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Hipyoda80

customer_reviews.title: They don’t stack - handles are too short
customer_reviews.text: The handles are too short to allow you to stack the barbells, which is required to do some exercises
customer_reviews.author: VV

customer_reviews.title: Workout is wonderful with Speedo Barbells
customer_reviews.text: I saw that someone wrote in that the Barbells hold water. I found that if I press down at the red end, it will reveal two holes and I can release the water right at the pool. I hope this helps. I was glad to find that the red is closer to a hot pink. Someone commented how great the color was with my swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Jean & Ron

customer_reviews.title: NOT RELIABLE
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of uses in the pool of the Speedo aqua fitness barbells, the red plug fell off on one side. The image above on the right is my temporary solution of using a water bottle cap...it probably will not hold. I plan to call the seller TheLifeGuard Store on Monday. I will update if they can provide a replacement plug.
customer_reviews.author: FATIMA DHALLA

customer_reviews.title: Great work out!
customer_reviews.text: Love them this pair was a gift because I love mine so much!
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Water Resistance while Exercising
customer_reviews.text: Love using these in the pool! Two of my Friends also have these and they recommended to me. Very glad I took their recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: Karen O.

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I use them during aqua classes three days a week and they're perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work well the two times we used them ...
customer_reviews.text: Seem to work well the two times we used them. Our season is about over in upstate NY so will know more next year. Only negative is that water gets inside somehow and I am concerned about mold and bacteria . We stored them on end in a bucket for a few days and they seemed to dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Edward D. Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Great look and feel.
customer_reviews.text: I use them daily in the pool and get a good aerobic workout in class. Lots of compliments on the look.
customer_reviews.author: marjorie ray

customer_reviews.title: needs more "weight" for set
customer_reviews.text: bar too small and larger "weights" needed for true workout success.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wright

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product would be good if it were manufactured as a quality product. I have found on multiple occasions the cap on the end of the water dumbbell separates. The little tabs that hold it onto the pvc handle are to short and with moderate exertion pull out. I will now have to find proper size pvc, cut to proper length and glue plumbing end-caps to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee H Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just wat is needed to assist in water aerobics class
customer_reviews.author: MeMe

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 sets because my wife and I shared a set that finally broke after 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to your water workout
customer_reviews.text: These have worked out great for me. The quality seems good, and they certainly add a lot of resistance to the exercises. Also, they provide enough flotation that I can put one under each armpit and they will hold me up, so I can kick my way up and down the length of the pool, adding another way to exercise with them.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: ... these for my water aerobics class and they work great! I have arthritic hands and everyone was using ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my water aerobics class and they work great! I have arthritic hands and everyone was using plastic gallon bottles to work out with which really hurt my hands and wrists. These barbells are perfect, gentle and still provide good resistance for a thorough workout. Very worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alice L. Millligan

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I am a female and bought the large, glad i did. I like a good workout. These are very nice water weights, very comfortable to hold and use. Dry quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P

customer_reviews.title: They are not red
customer_reviews.text: I'm a man so when I pick these I relied heavily on the description . The red looks pink not red like the description if it was truthful I would've purchased different ones. Other than that they are what was ordered . For the guys that order these you offer more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works great only issues is my hands just fit not much extra space. use daily and are holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: perfect medium weight
customer_reviews.text: I have Rheumatoid Arthritis and have been working out with the YMCA's weights. They have become too light and so I ordered these. I love them, they are medium so not too heavy when they get wet. Not scratchy like the usual white ones. They are perfect for the person who wants to increase their weights but don't want to go too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: These barbells are great for the pool, the resistance is nice and they are easy to hold on to.
customer_reviews.author: The Late Bloomer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend these.
customer_reviews.text: They are not heavy enough for me, as I’m used to heavier water weights ,for under the water. Also, they are not east to cross, so they don’t roll away on the side of the pool Or when we use two in one hand to make figure eights. Would have sent back but too much hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Water Bells!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my cousin, who has more upper body strength than I do (she's also mid 50s rather than over 60) because she works out. She finds them challenging without being too strong. They're a bit too much for my injured rotator cuff area. Great for water aerobics!
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. DiMartino

customer_reviews.title: There have 2 holes at each end of the bar ...
customer_reviews.text: There have 2 holes at each end of the bar so you have to make sure you stand them on there ends so they drain. I found out after I get my swim bag all wet. The older style did not have the holes. Did not have to worry about getting your stuff wet.
customer_reviews.author: ginseven

customer_reviews.title: Good for low intensity workout.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as much resistance that I am used to. I go to the local YMCA but my daughter has a pool for summer workouts. The hand grips are a little short but usable. They do collect water that I have to drain out after each usage. I would recommend for those not accustomed to a water aerobics class.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H. Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I use these in our pool workouts. It's another way to have fun in the pool, and get a good strength training session at the same time! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: I lost mine - they were old - these new ones are great!
customer_reviews.text: Exercise in the water is fun and these work great!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne LK

customer_reviews.title: Deceptively effective!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly deceptive in its ability to work the shoulders and arms. You don't think your working that hard, but an hour later, you really feel it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marc  A. Luker

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for my mom and she's been using it ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mom and she's been using it at the pool each time. When she first saw the item, she questioned whether or not she can even float in the water with it. After using it, she loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use these in the pool and they have held up nicely. They are very light out of the water but provide a medium amount of resistance. Sometimes water gets inside but just stand them on end and the water drains right out.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my pool workout
customer_reviews.text: Easy light weight and very effective for training in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: On the mend

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised - good workout in the water
customer_reviews.text: One of the weights is not sealed completely and leaks - other than that - good performance
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the white foam dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: These dumbells work Ok, and are probably sufficient for someone just starting out... but they aren't as good as the white foam ones that come in 3 different resistance levels. This pair is not bouyant enough to give me a good, strong workout. I prefer the medium or heavy white ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: will give you a work out
customer_reviews.text: these are wonderful for a pool work out. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Important For Water Aerobics
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my water exercises: strengthening, aerobics, coordination and balancing.
customer_reviews.author: Gospelqueen

customer_reviews.title: Good and cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to use in the backyard pool. She likes it.
customer_reviews.author: An H Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: These Rock!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a workout in the pool. They do drip from somewhere inside a little after use so I put them on a trash bag in my trunk when leaving class. But I think they are still the best on the market. Be sure to put your initials on these with a Sharpie because everyone at my pool is catching on and there are a whole herd of them!
customer_reviews.author: lilacbluestone

customer_reviews.title: We love these barbells
customer_reviews.text: We love these barbells! We previously bought a set at Sports Authority. Since both my husband and I use them everyday in the pool, we decided to buy a second set. Several friends have purchased other barbells with triangular shaped ends: these did not offer enough resistance to provide a decent workout. So other people have purchased these too after seeing how well they work.
customer_reviews.author: LKS

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery. Product appears to be well-made. Have ...
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery. Product appears to be well-made. Have only used 3 or 4 times, so can't attest to its longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Speedo Aqua Fitness Barbells, Charcoal/Red
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews stated that the product is flimsy and fell apart upon use. I found this to be a quality product and works well when used in the pool while doing aerobic exercises. Offers great resistance while exercising. This product performs well and is quality made. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: JamesL50

customer_reviews.title: Aqua barbells
customer_reviews.text: They are very light. Even under water, They seem too light for me. I don't feel that I get a good work out with them. They are good for holding on to and floating. You could kick your legs and get exercise that way while holding them in your hands to help you float.
customer_reviews.author: Kim1215

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: What I wanted,well made . Happy with packaging!! Work great on my work out. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: jill butler

customer_reviews.title: I guess they are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my wife, at her request. She hasn't complained about them, so I guess they are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Speedo Aqua Fitness Barbells, Charcoal/Red
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for your prompt delivery of my Speedo Aqua Fitness Barbells (Charcoal/Red). They work as well, or better, than other more expensive ones. I also love the colors; they're so unique in this regards... they are the only ones that are not white or blue, so I can spot them from far away... or someone can find me in a second while I'm in the pool with the rest of the Aqua Aerobics class. It's true they hold water inside like others do, but by just leaving them on the floor standing up, they get rid of the water inside. I continue loving Amazon.com for all the merchandise you have available and your prompt delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Yolita de Houston

customer_reviews.title: Mine work great
customer_reviews.text: I have the same set (but blue) that I bought in the store. This was purchased for my wife for use at the YMCA for water aerobics exercise. They hold up a lot better than other brands and the handgrips do not slip from one side to the other as you put resistance on them underwater. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Turner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent exercises!
customer_reviews.text: I did not even expect that this small device can give me such a good muscles load in the water. And it is fun.
customer_reviews.author: VA

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous for water aerobics, resistance is great, and they are well constructed. I would buy again. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Babbs

customer_reviews.title: made a friend happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friend, to replace her old ones which were worn out. She raves about them, and continually thanks me for them.
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: Was just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Price was higher than some other brands but am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A

customer_reviews.title: Ordered low resistance, got mid level. From day ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered low resistance, got mid level. From day 1 one side of each was loose when used under water. Disappointing from a speedo brand
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: These aqua Dumbbells are great for working out in the pool
customer_reviews.text: These aqua Dumbbells are great for working out in the pool. The only drawback is that they tend to retain water, so you have to be sure to shake them out after use.
customer_reviews.author: GF-SF

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic weights for water aerobics!
customer_reviews.text: Light out of the water but generates great resistance under the water. Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: CHDeA3

customer_reviews.title: Color is not as indicated
customer_reviews.text: One of the things that attracted me to these barbells was the red and charcoal color. I'm an Ohio State University fan and the school colors are scarlet and gray. This product is charcoal and pink with red round plastic pieces on the ends. I've used them only a couple weeks and the quality seems fine but I'm quite disappointed about the color.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Hreat Barbells
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm in the pool. They may not weigh anything out of the water, but use them in the water and you get great resistance. Highly recommend them for aqua fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking your water workout to the next level
customer_reviews.text: I really like the additional resistance and the soft handles are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Janita

customer_reviews.title: These barbells are great. I'm doing water aerobics a couple times per ...
customer_reviews.text: These barbells are great. I'm doing water aerobics a couple times per week, and they are standing up to the workouts. Very interesting concept. So light weight out of the water, but great resistance in the water. East to transport. I do recommend them. A little water can get inside, but is easily removed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Weston

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Light out of the water. Good resistance in the water. Feels good in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Fun to just float around in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Fun to just float around in the pool. Great workout help for arms and shoulders. Made very well good quality.
customer_reviews.author: LDizzy

customer_reviews.title: Holds water.  Makes a mess as it slowly drains
customer_reviews.text: They hold water. After sitting over night there was still water inside that slowly dripped out. Could not exchange due to 30 policies.
customer_reviews.author: BCP

product_meta.title: Speedo Unisex Swim Aqua Fitness Barbell
product_meta.description: The Speedo Aquatic Fitness barbells (1-lb, 5-oz each) can be used for maximum resistance during aquatic fitness activities. They are constructed with lightweight EVA foam and can easily be packed and taken with you.
feature_bullets: Provides floatation support while building upper body strength
Soft padded grips for extended workouts
Use both barbells for maximum resistance during aquatic fitness activities

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
